body_html:
Places that need to be guarded with: if (bias != NULL) {...}

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THNN/generic/VolumetricConvolutionMM.c#L303-L310 (if bias == NULL, fill the output with zeros)

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THNN/generic/VolumetricConvolutionMM.c#L554-L563

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/VolumetricConvolution.cu#L173-L196

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/VolumetricConvolution.cu#L456-L491

When i doubt, look at SpatialConvolution*

cc: @elistevens

body:
Places that need to be guarded with: `if (bias != NULL) {...}`

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THNN/generic/VolumetricConvolutionMM.c#L303-L310 (if bias == NULL, fill the output with zeros)

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THNN/generic/VolumetricConvolutionMM.c#L554-L563

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/VolumetricConvolution.cu#L173-L196

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/VolumetricConvolution.cu#L456-L491

When i doubt, look at SpatialConvolution*

cc: @elistevens
